videos.description: Christian Bishop slips the screen and rocks the rim for a Longhorns dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Christian Bishop throws down powerful flush vs. West Virginia Mountaineers) 2022/01/01 ESHEET

videos.headline: Christian Bishop throws down the powerful flush

videos.description: Christian Bishop gathers the assist from Dylan Disu and lays it in to regain the lead.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Dylan Disu makes a sweet pass) 2022/01/01 ESHEET

videos.headline: Dylan Disu dimes Christian Bishop for a Longhorns bucket

videos.description: Marcus Carr drains the 3-pointer from downtown in tight coverage.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Marcus Carr shows off the range on triple) 2022/01/01 ESHEET

videos.headline: Marcus Carr shows off the range on this triple

videos.description: Texas' Marcus Carr gathers the rock and muscles his way to the bucket for the and-1.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Marcus Carr with the and-1 bucket) 2022/01/01 ESHEET

videos.headline: Marcus Carr drives to the paint and drains and-1

videos.description: Courtney Ramey dimes it behind the defender's back to Timmy Allen who finishes with the layup.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Courtney Ramey makes a sweet dish) 2022/01/01 ESHEET

videos.headline: Courtney Ramey makes a sweet dish to Timmy Allen for a Longhorns basket

videos.description: Marcus Carr makes a great defensive play and finishes with the layup to extend the Longhorns lead in the second half.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Marcus Carr makes a great defensive play for the steal) 2022/01/01 ESHEET

videos.headline: Marcus Carr gets the steal and easy layup for the Longhorns

videos.description: Malik Curry muscles his way to the basket and drains the and-1 for the Mountaineers.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Malik Curry somehow gets the and-1 to fall) 2022/01/01 ESHEET

videos.headline: Malik Curry somehow gets the and-1 to fall
